fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Poison a target, their ability will malfunction in a way that appears like it didn't, up to host's interpretation.
- Use an ability from any other role. (1 use, +1 use at the start of Night 4)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Examples of malfunctioning: `Attacks saying they killed the target or hit someone with defense while having no effect, Investigations bringing false results, Protective abilities doing nothing and saying the target was attacked when they werent, Supportive abilities giving feedback as if they worked when they do nothing.`
- The first time you are hanged, the last person to vote you is hanged instead.
- The first time you are killed at night, you will survive until the end of the next one.
